lender.name: Valli

lender.name: Deirdre

lender.occupational_info: My company provides advice (consultancy) and training to companies that want to improve the customer service they offer

lender.name: Amelie
lender.loan_because: Everyone that can, should.
lender.occupational_info: I care for my children at home.

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: this is a wonderful way of building community of people from around the world and enabling them to pool resources for the betterment of all society.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who have the desire to progress, but lack the resources or the support to do so.

lender.name: Danie
lender.loan_because: We need to help good workers get a start

lender.name: Tay's Family
lender.loan_because: If you give a man a fish today, he will grow hungry tomorrow. If you give the man the tools to fish today, he will have enough to eat tomorrow and beyond.
lender.occupational_info: Professional businessman with a happy family.

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because: This is a brilliant opportunity for anyone to help out people all over the world and to have some sort of positive impact on their lives.

lender.name: Tai
lender.occupational_info: Travel addict and adventurer in my free time, risk management consultant during working hours. Drop me a line and I will tell you more!

lender.name: Rajika

lender.occupational_info: A full time mother :)

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a chance in life.

lender.name: Christopher

lender.occupational_info: I run a business making machineries to test natural latex rubber products

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I want to pass on the good fortune I have been blessed with and try to make a difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Suzanna

lender.name: Eduardo

lender.occupational_info: Its is a hard work, but I try to make my job very gratifying and pleasant

lender.name: Weng
lender.loan_because: I would like to give back to the society and give an equal chance for others to succeed as well.
lender.occupational_info: I run the Asia Pacific operations of a Multi National Software company. This company has its humble beginnings in South Africa. I was given a chance to be successful in my career and I find this a wonderful way to give back.

lender.name: Harp
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough that I can. I love this idea so much because it is about legacy - changing not just today but the future for our hardworking, determined sisters and brothers around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses brand themselves so they stand out and get noticed. I also teach at 2 universities.

lender.name: Clariane
lender.loan_because: We need to help.
lender.occupational_info: Get a better world

lender.name: Shakila
lender.loan_because: I consciously remember the times I've received support from expected and unexpected sources. For me, giving is an act of gratitude.

lender.name: Colin Kelley
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.occupational_info: Making Dreams A Reality is my goal. Part of that goal includes specializing in Socially Responsible Investing which has investors putting their money in companies that are trying to clean up the enironmental mess we've created.

lender.loan_because: i want to give and it is nice to see someone somewhere in the world happy and has the opportunity to change their lives.

lender.occupational_info: Megan goes to Middle School, does babysitting and helps out around the house. Audrey, an elementary school student, gets an allowance from her parents for chores at home.

lender.occupational_info: I help other people who want to grow their businesses.

lender.name: Tim and Colleen
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Mike & Laurel
lender.loan_because: All of us are brothers and sisters. It's the right thing to do to help each other, without ideologies and political agendas.
lender.occupational_info: We own a small manufacturing company, designing and building equipment cases for electronics, and optics, and similar sensitive products.

lender.name: Meredith and Emma
lender.loan_because: We want to help others

lender.loan_because: Because I want to help her to have a better life, to realise her dream.

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: There are so many people who have so little when I have so much. I'd like to give someone a chance to have a better life. It feels great.
lender.occupational_info: I get on a bus at 7am to go to school. I take multiple honors classes and play trumpet in the band there. I go to marching band after school in the fall, jazz band in the winter and track, where I run long distance in the spring. When I have something after school, I get home at around 6:30, if not it is around 3pm. I'm also learning to play tenor saxophone on the side.

lender.name: Bodil ,Bergen,Norway
lender.loan_because: I got a giftcertificate from my brother for christmas.

I run the website: www.VolunteerForum.se

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: To give is to receive. I have been very fortunate and so I would like to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Director of Financial Operations

lender.name: Bonnie & Mike
lender.loan_because: Helping others achieve their goal is rewarding.

lender.name: Chelanllama
lender.loan_because: Others deserve a chance for a decent living. I live in an isolated area and this is one way I can help.
lender.occupational_info: Taught Spanish in High School for 30 years and now living on a llama ranch.

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because:
As an entrepreneur, I want to help other entrepreneurs. I have been through challenging times before, so now it's time to give back and help others.
Kiva makes so much sense because: - we help those who are in need, - we can make a big difference, - there's very high Return on Input (my own take on the Return on Investment concept - we put in a little, they benefit so much - we get a really big bang for our buck!), - we create and add value to others, - this is relatively low risk (low default risk)
I've been looking to become a venture capitalist / angel investor so Kiva offers me a great launching pad! :)
lender.occupational_info: - Marketing and management consulting, - Consulting in Corporate Social Responsibility / Green Marketing, - Development of business proposals and business plans, - Copywriting, - Internet marketing, - Target marketing / Lead Generation services

lender.name: Diego Felipe
lender.loan_because: I am a young that learned early since the value of the work, I am very comunicative and of leadership. Work with YOU since the eight years of age and ja I passed for diverse other areas. I developed a project of spreading of house sell website and rendering of related services. But had to a badly intentioned attitude of a friend, I lost my money and I am needing aid pra recommences. I believe my idea and my capacity, but necessary of financial aid at the moment.
lender.occupational_info: Well still not begin the enterprise, but already I acted in the house sell area, as manager of an office that soon left the red and opened two branch offices. I know the market, I know of the real necessities of the advertisers and the purchasers. I studied well this project very therefore ja I have it in mind ja make some years.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I love giving to other pro-active people around the world. It's so important.

lender.name: King
lender.loan_because: God calls us to share our blessings.

lender.name: Tano
lender.loan_because: That a simple act can make a considerable difference in someone's life is a powerful thing, and am proud to be a part of it.

lender.name: Sally
lender.occupation: Film/TV Executive but in the middle of change!

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: Give a Man a Fish.....
lender.occupational_info: I help People Own land or a home.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: We are doing a class project on KIVA loans, but also because these people are inspiring!

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone who has a dream, and energy to make the dream come true deserves a fair chance.

lender.name: Ronan
lender.loan_because:
I truly believe in the free market system and want to assist small business owners around the world. After reading Muhammad Yunus' book "Banker to the Poor", I wanted to find out for myself how the concept of microfinance works.
I am excited that 8 MFIs from the Philippines are currently partnered with Kiva. As a result, the majority of my new loans will focus on that area. I will continue to diversify my lending portfolio with short-term loans from other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info:
I assist companies with implementing technological solutions that enable them to operate more efficiently.
In addition to being a KIVA lender, I also sponsor a child through Compassion International.
I am grateful that I have the opportunity to make a small impression on the lives of others and help them out of the devastation of poverty.
About Compassion International: Compassion International exists as a Christian child advocacy ministry that releases children from spiritual, economic, social and physical poverty and enables them to become responsible, fulfilled Christian adults.
Founded by the Rev. Everett Swanson in 1952, Compassion began providing Korean War orphans with food, shelter, education and health care, as well as Christian training.
Today, Compassion helps more than 1 million children in 24 countries.
Visit the Compassion website: www.compassion.com

lender.name: Janna
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with clients in pain to help them recover.

lender.name: Keslin & Chloe
lender.loan_because: we want them to live as long and happily as they can. We have a home and love, clean food and water. We are grateful for that and we want to share what we can.
lender.occupational_info: Chloe is in grade 2 French Immersion and Keslin is a grade 11 student. Keslin works at two jobs and volunteers in her community as well.

lender.name: Justace
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working at the D0 experiment at the Fermi National Accelerators Laboratory. My current push is to search for the small sub-atomic particle that is responsible for giveing mass unto the universe... The Higgs (Ohhh what fun |-) )

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Our son-in-law introduced us to Kiva with a gift certificate for Christmas. This is an exciting opportunity to make a difference around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. government helping to provide service to the public in Hawaii and the Far Pacific.

lender.name: Tasha

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.occupational_info: Donna is a self-employed bookkeeper/accountant who helps small businesses with their financial records. Paul works for our city enforcing zoning regulations.

lender.occupational_info: I work for the March of Dimes, and we save babies from birth defects, premature birth, and infant mortality.

lender.loan_because: I want to do something that will help this world be a better place.i g
lender.occupational_info: I go to school every week day from 7:20 in the morning to 2:05. I have lots of friends and am currently learning physics, statistics, journalism, English, and French.

lender.occupational_info: i study the human body - how it works, what happens when it isn't working, and with any luck, how to fix it.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I think it is an awesome gift to be able to give to someone and make a difference and an impact on their life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children as well as adults, teaching English as a foreign language.

lender.occupational_info: I am working to deply renewable energy technology in North America. I manage the energy resources of several irrigation districts in California.

I am very happy to have found Kiva and I expect to make many loans in the future. I also hope to interest the Chickasaw people in becoming involved with Kiva.

lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Hans

lender.occupational_info: Working as a business manager in a non-profit association, part of my activities on the job, and outside office hours could be classified under the emerging discipline of social entrepreneurship.

Thanks to Kiva, I have a great place to start.
lender.occupational_info: Using a computer, I create print materials like brochures and business cards and I also design web sites. I am a small business owner myself and can appreciate what goes into keeping it going no matter what line of work or what country it is in.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jim, Jean, and Adam
lender.loan_because: In a small way, we reach another person. Our family is fortunate. Circumstances can change in an instant. You never know.
lender.occupational_info: Jim worked with an Afghan refugee many years ago to create a basic needs service organization for refugees in the San Francisco Bay area. Jim has been a teacher, a biologist/entomologist, and is now a writer. Jean works in telecommunications. Adam is a student.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want people to be able to be self-sufficient through their own work the way I have had the good fortune to be.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make the transition from marriage to divorce in the most productive, collaborative way possible.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I want people to capture their dreams and set them free.
lender.occupational_info: I work with young people every day and each day is different. I work to help youth help themselves.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I passionately support economic development. Kiva and microfinance enable me to support entrepreneurs in a way that has an immediate and long-term positive impact on the quality of people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help high school students make career choices with vocational exploration, internship experiences, and portfolio development.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe that borders are lines on a map and religions are all beautiful rivers to the same great ocean. People have helped me in my life and I would simply like to do that for others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach many young children.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to keep in contact with other professionals in other cultures, economic situations, and lifestyles.
lender.occupational_info: I help corporations email their customers more effectively.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because:
Regardless of the size of your business, you make an impact on the community surrounding you. The more you grow, the more of an impact you have on your community and the world. Every business no matter how small or large, can always use a little extra spending money. "Rainy days seem to wind up sunny, 'long as you got a little spending money"
Having the good fortune to have traveled to a number of different countries, I've seen the vast differences in wealth (or lack of), and I glad I'm able to help out others who may be less fortunate.
Note the crudely written 'Car Wash' sign, in the above photo. This was taken in Botswana, Southern Africa. If you are creative and resourceful, you can start a business most anywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the owner of a freight brokerage company. We are able to ship most any thing, to most anywhere on the planet

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I try to help people who are less fortunate.

lender.name: Sierra
lender.loan_because: I can help!

lender.name: DENNIS
lender.loan_because: All people should have an opportunity to fullfill their dreams and advance in life. Sometimes, we all need a little help.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I've been so lucky in my life, it's my honor to lend to others.

lender.loan_because: I can and I should
